features: Additional travel safety feature includes a built-in sternum strap whistle
Deter theft with passive locking systems on the SafeZone and main compartment as well as lockable zippers and zipper pulls (locks sold separately)
Belongings are held securely in place and organized with internal compression straps and mesh storage pockets
Securely store a water bottle and other small items in the zippered side pocket
Designed as a carry-on compliant piece for most airlines (Always check with your airline regarding carry-on regulations before travel)
Protect and organize a phone, sunglasses, cords and small valuables in the SafeZone compartment
Keep money and a passport safe from pickpockets in the covert CashStash compartment hidden under the SafeZone
Prevent wear and tear by tucking away the contoured shoulder straps and hipbelt when not in use
Protect up to a 15" MacBook® and 12 9" tablet in dedicated storage compartment
Easily attach a carabiner and other items onto the pack with external lash points
Height x Width x Depth 9.8 x 13.0 x 21.5 in / 25.0 x 33.0 x 55.0 cm
